snippet: For a town of grand monuments and boulevards, a wardrobe that fails to reflect the gravitas of buildings where treaties were signed and wars were ended is not tolerated.
abstract: Politicians who work inside the Beltway abide by one of the strictest dress codes in the country; each branch, department and agency that falls under the direction of the federal government has an unwritten standard for what is acceptable work attire; code is enforced either by behind-the-back whispers or forced exits.
lead_paragraph: For a town of grand monuments and boulevards, a wardrobe that fails to reflect the gravitas of buildings where treaties were signed and wars were ended is not tolerated.

headline.main: Sartorial Pluck Has No Place in Washington, the City of Fancy Fridays
headline.print_headline: Sartorial Pluck Has No Place in the City of Fancy Fridays
